text: فَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ فَهُمْ فِى رَوْضَةٍ يُحْبَرُونَ

translation.en.sahih: And as for those who had believed and done righteous deeds, they will be in a garden [of Paradise], delighted.
translation.id.indonesian: Adapun orang-orang yang beriman dan mengerjakan amal saleh, maka mereka di dalam taman (surga) bergembira.
